content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs the system, I received a command to read a file named "best_ways_to_learn_abroad.zip", but it returned an error stating that \'NoneType\' object has no attribute \'encoding\'. Then, I executed a shell command to unzip the file and it returned the file names and dates within the archive. \n\nIn the latest development, I received a command to read a file named "best_ways_to_learn_abroad/best_ways_to_learn_abroad.txt" and it returned the best ways to learn a language abroad. I also executed a command to google "language schools in Spain" and received a list of websites with information on the best Spanish schools in Spain.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text provides information about the top Spanish language schools in Spain based on a ranking system that considers factors such as popularity, prices, location, organization, and range of study programs. The ranking only includes schools accredited by the Instituto Cervantes and members of FEDELE, which ensure high-quality teaching of Spanish in Spain. The article lists the top 15 schools, including International House Valencia, Hispania Escuela de Español in Valencia, Cervantes Escuela Internacional in Malaga, Tia Tula-Spanish School in Salamanca, and Proyecto Español in Granada and Alicante. However, the text does not provide information about the best language schools in Spain. \n \n Links: ['\\n\\t\\tSkip to content (https://letsspeakspanish.com/blog/best-spanish-schools-spain/#content)', '\\nFacebook-f\\n  (https://www.facebook.com/speakspanishfluently/)', '\\nYoutube\\n  (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCUQDQfuEF6oSoOuVuebZMrQ)', '\\nPinterest-p\\n  (https://pinterest.com/letsspeakspanish)', '\\nInstagram\\n  (https://www.instagram.com/speakspanishfluently)']"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "best language schools in Spain"}}}'}]
"""
